ygData.subject: Re: Fast ways to level as a Paladin, Druid, or Shaman?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the fastest way to level for anybody is to get a good group together with tanks, Healers, and Mages, Bards help alot to with their songs. After you
ygData.messageBody:
I think the fastest way to level for anybody is to get
a good group together with tanks, Healers, and Mages,
Bards help alot to with their songs. After you have a
good group together go after red and yellow cons but
try to go after reds as much as possible. Ofcourse
make sure that your group of 5, 6 level characters
does not decided to take on a sand giant or griffawn.
But I tanked Scarabs and Orc centurians that are red
for me with a good group and leveled fast from 5 to 9.
About 10 hours playing time. Scarabs now con yellow so
I need to find another place to hunt soon. Oh and I
have been hunting in misty thicket.
